ResearchTabDef.label: whelingnorther technique
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Research projects from HRG164hjo's mod "WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance"

ResearchProjectDef.label: civilian techniques
ResearchProjectDef.description: practical techniques for civilian benefits, aiming for improving quality of life.

ResearchProjectDef.label: usage of excess lives
ResearchProjectDef.description: sometimes there can be excess lives that causing burden to our community, and here's some tricks about how to get rid of them while doing good, or at least no harm to our community.

ResearchProjectDef.label: military supply
ResearchProjectDef.description: the special techniques of how to make whelingnorther military supplies out from common resources based on local conditions. these special techniques is hold secret by Whelingnorther Alliance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: military material
ResearchProjectDef.description: the special techniques of how to make unique materials used by whelingnorther military based on local conditions. these special techniques is hold secret by Whelingnorther Alliance.

ResearchProjectDef.label: standard arsenal
ResearchProjectDef.description: the standard arsenal used by whelingnorther alliance to arm their soldiers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: field analysis
ResearchProjectDef.description: basic theories and techniques to manipulate field instead of manipulate solid matter.

ResearchProjectDef.label: particle armory
ResearchProjectDef.description: basic theories and techniques about how to produce and make use of unique particles that exists in nature world or not.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced arsenal
ResearchProjectDef.description: the advanced technology used by whelingnorther alliance to arm their elite fighters.

ResearchProjectDef.label: lysis field
ResearchProjectDef.description: an artificial field that can weaken inner bounds of solid matter, resulting it being fragile. when affect matter can no longer tolerate it and breaks down, this field can spread to other things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: iron guardian
ResearchProjectDef.description: the advanced technology used by whelingnorther alliance to arm their elite fighters.

ResearchProjectDef.label: reach to the void
ResearchProjectDef.description:
give up ego

step into void

all mind expire

world round ascend

ResearchProjectDef.label: dark apocalypse
ResearchProjectDef.description: Science is the doctrine that explains the entire material world; Phenomenology is the doctrine that explains the entire phenomenal world, including the material world; and Voidology, at least for now, is most likely the doctrine that answers what exists beneath the phenomenal world and how to understand this "void world." Is Voidology the further truth we are seeking? How can we find this further truth? We once proclaimed the termination of Phenomenology with our reality reconstruction technique; now we stand at the end of the path, searching for a way forward.
